name: ResourceList
description: Links supporting resources to an anchor object (typically an Actor Profile, Project, Meeting or Community).

attributeDefs.name: resourceUse
attributeDefs.description: Description of how the resource is used, or why it is useful.

attributeDefs.name: watchResource
attributeDefs.description: Indicator whether the anchor should receive notifications of changes to the resource.

endDef1.name: supportingResources
endDef1.description: Resources identified as of interest to the anchor.

endDef2.name: resourceListAnchors
endDef2.description: Referenceable objects that are using the linked to resource.
